glossentry.glossdef: Usage Control Solution is a system to monitor data usage and to set control on the usage.
User Data Repository is a consolidated database where user data is managed.
User Data Repository notification from a consolidated database where user data is managed.
Usage Limit is the defined as the limit after which the subscriber is not able to manually add services.
Universal Mobile Telecommunication Systems is a third generation mobile cellular system for networks that are based on the GSM standard.
Universal Resource Locator is the address that refers to the defined objects on the World Wide Web.
Unstructured Supplementary Service Data is a system that enables communication through text between a mobile phone and an application program in a network.
A service that provides the user protection against overage charges and monitors the wireless account usage.
Used Service Unit is a variable that indicates the reported units in CCR from CCR-U/T
